question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to ALL-STAR Cafe in Central. When you reach the current location, what is the direction to the destination?  
choose:  
A. I am currently located to the right of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central, well above the surrounding buildings.  
B. I am currently located on the ground to the west and right of the central ALL-STAR Cafe.  
C. I am currently located directly above the central ALL-STAR Cafe.  
D. I am currently located in the upper right direction of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central, at a height equivalent to the building.  
E. I am currently located on the upper left side of the ALL-STAR Café in Central, above the street and slightly above the building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The current location is on the upper left side of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central, as indicated by the perspective and position relative to the building and street layout. The agent is above the street level and slightly elevated compared to the surrounding structures, which aligns with option E.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 20)]
Option: [E]
Reason: From the beginning of the video to the end, the camera shows the agent's perspective as it approaches the ALL-STAR Cafe. The cafe is located on the right side of the street. The agent is positioned on the upper left side of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central, above the street and slightly above the building. Therefore, option E is correct. The provided answer is also correct.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The current location is on the upper left side of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central, as indicated by the perspective and position relative to the building and street layout. The agent is above the street level and slightly elevated compared to the surrounding structures, which aligns with option E.
